name: Puppy Cookies
description:
The cutest puzzle adventure you will ever see! Match cookies and smash ants with friends and family!

Join the cutest puppy in the world in a delicious and epic adventure through a yard full of colored cookies and angry ants.

Puppy Cookies is free to play and you can enjoy it alone or compete with your friends and family to see who gets the highest score.

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

PLAY WITH A UNIQUE PUPPY

Get fun by changing the way your puppy looks. You can customize it with glasses, hats, clothes, mustaches, beards and much more. The visual combinations are endless.

Set up your own puppy and show your friends how cool it is!

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

Puppy Cookies features a lot of fun and easy to play levels with:

● A diverse gameplay with more than 6 game modes to entertain you and challenge your skills.
● Bonus levels, shops and items to unlock by completing levels.
● Cute graphics and the possibility to customize your puppy's appearance.
● Leaderboards for you and your Facebook friends.
● Special anthill levels to smash as many ants you can.
● Pet shop items and power-ups to help you with those challenging levels.

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆
